description.en: The magic stone that protects the Altar of Hero. It contains some of the Heroes of the Past within it.
description.ar: The magic stone that protects the Altar of Hero. It contains some of the Heroes of the Past within it.
description.br: A pedra mágica que protege o Altar do Herói. Contém alguns dos Heróis do Passado.
description.cns: 守护英雄祭团的魔法宝石，仍有英雄之灵魂庇佑着
description.de: (Jobquestitem) Der magische Stein beschützt den Altar of Hero mit dem Hero Stone. Die Seelen der Helden sind in ihm.
description.fi: The magic stone that protects the Altar of Hero. It contains some of the Heroes of the Past within it.
description.fil: The magic stone that protects the Altar of Hero. It contains some of the Heroes of the Past within it.
description.fr: pierre précieuse contenant l'âme des Héros morts durant la Grande Guerre et protègeant l'Autel des Héros.
description.id: Batu ajaib yang melindungi Altar of Hero. Batu ini berisi beberapa Heroes of the Past di dalamnya.
description.it: The magic stone that protects the Altar of Hero. It contains some of the Heroes of the Past within it.
description.jp: 英雄の宝石と共に、英雄の祭壇を守護する神秘の宝玉。英雄戦争後、英雄達が人類の歴史を見守るため、己が魂の一部を込めて遺したという。「我らが去っても、我らの志は久遠に残らん」
description.kr: 영웅의 보석과 함께 영웅의 제단을 수호하는 또다른 마법 보석으로 영웅전쟁이 끝나고 영웅들의 영혼의 조각을 담아놓았다고 한다.
description.nl: The magic stone that protects the Altar of Hero. It contains some of the Heroes of the Past within it.
description.pl: The magic stone that protects the Altar of Hero. It contains some of the Heroes of the Past within it.
description.ru: Магический камень, оберег Алтаря героев. В нем заключены частицы душ героев прошлого.
description.sp: La piedra mágica que protege el Altar del Héroe. Contiene algunos de los Héroes del Pasado en su interior.
description.sw: The magic stone that protects the Altar of Hero. It contains some of the Heroes of the Past within it.
description.th: หินวิเศษที่ปกป้องแท่นบูชาของฮีโร่ มันมีวีรบุรุษแห่งอดีตบางส่วนอยู่ภายใน
description.tw: 守護英雄祭團的魔法寶石，仍有英雄之靈魂庇佑著
description.vi: Viên đá ma thuật bảo vệ Altar of Hero. Nó chứa một số anh hùng của quá khứ bên trong nó.
